mapper.insert: insert into drug_domestic (id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, is_deleted, my_id, approval_number, product_name, english_name, commodity_name, dosage, specifications, product_unit, product_addr, product_type, approval_time, original_approval_number, drug_standard_code, drug_standard_code_remark, related_database, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{myId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugStandardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugStandardCodeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relatedDatabase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update drug_domestic set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, my_id = #{myId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_number = #{approvalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, english_name = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_name = #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dosage = #{dosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specifications = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_unit = #{productUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_addr = #{productAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_time = #{approvalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, original_approval_number = #{originalApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_standard_code = #{drugStandardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_standard_code_remark = #{drugStandardCodeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, related_database = #{relatedDatabase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, is_deleted, my_id, approval_number, product_name, english_name, commodity_name, dosage, specifications, product_unit, product_addr, product_type, approval_time, original_approval_number, drug_standard_code, drug_standard_code_remark, related_database, remark from drug_domestic where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, is_deleted, my_id, approval_number, product_name, english_name, commodity_name, dosage, specifications, product_unit, product_addr, product_type, approval_time, original_approval_number, drug_standard_code, drug_standard_code_remark, related_database, remark from drug_domestic
